sentences.sContent: We will create a poker-hand evaluator, a slot-machine generator, and a casino bank, allowing you to practice some trickier PHP logic.
sentences.sContent_eng: We will create a poker-hand evaluator, a slot-machine generator, and a casino bank, allowing you to practice some trickier PHP logic.
sentences.sCn: 我们将创建一个扑克牌求值程序、老虎机生成器及博彩银行，允许您实践一些更棘手的 PHP 逻辑。

synos.tran: 评估员；[电子]鉴别器；求值程序

words.tran: 评价；[审计] 评估；估价；求值
